item.description:
The New England Convervatory of Music will present a student production of Jacques Offenbach's tuneful opera buffa La Perichole - in French but with English spoken parts. I am going on Monday, Feb. 13th 8:00 performance. After-performance social at the Intermission Lounge (across the street at 228 Tremont Street). With luck we will also meetup in the lobby during intermission. Tickets are $20+service charge if ordered online at www.necmusic.edu or just $20 at the box office. (There will probably be tickets available at performance time  if you want to chance it.)

THURMAN SMITH  781-729-3832 / 617-571-3740 CELL
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the main lobby during intermission and after the performance to gather for walk to Intermission Lounge

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: See La Perichole at the Cutler Majestic
